name: Flamier
text:
—Orbiter-san.
Thank you for participating in your regular check-up.
It took a little longer than expected.

name: Andrew
text:
But I heard the test results were all clear.
You did well, Orbiter.

name: Flamier
text:
Oh, that's good.
How are you feeling?

—Moon Archimedes Colony
Archimedes Group Headquarters,
Research and Development Center, Sector 4.

Passing by a sign that read "Biomedical Research Building,"
the person called Orbiter turned to the two.

name: Orbiter
text:
Hmm... I don't feel bad.
I don't remember much about the diagnosis though...
I always fall asleep quickly.

name: Orbiter
text:
The doctor said it's called general anesthesia.
...But, I don't like hospitals.

name: Orbiter
text:
It's boring, they touch my body a lot,
and I have to come again and again...

name: Orbiter
text:
Everyone's always working,
so no one plays with me at all...
I want to be somewhere more fun!

A voice like an innocent boy from inside
the large spacesuit responded, sulking.

name: Andrew
text:
Everyone working here is on duty,
so that can't be helped.

name: Orbiter
text:
That's true, but...
I'm perfectly fine without any tests.
There's nothing wrong with me.

name: Orbiter
text:
Right, Andrew!
Let's go out with Flamier!
I don't know anything about the moon by myself!

name: Andrew
text:
Go out?
...Hmm, that's a great idea,
but I already have plans today.

name: Flamier
text:
I apologize, Orbiter-san.
We have other business to attend to after this...

name: Flamier
text:
A ceremony is being held at the "Pillar of Light",
and we need to be present for it.

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, really...
You both have plans...
Aw, that's boring.

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, where's the "Pillar of Light"?
What do you do at a ceremony?

Leaving the Archimedes Group Headquarters,
the three turned their faces towards
the main street of the Archimedes Colony.

At the end of their gaze,
in the center of the colony,
a giant landmark tower stood tall.

name: Andrew
text:
—That's the "Pillar of Light".
It also incorporates the urban operation functions
and administrative management facilities of the Archimedes Colony.

name: Orbiter
text:
Urban operation...
Administrative management... facilities?
Hmm, doesn't sound like a fun place...

name: Flamier
text:
That's not true.
As a leading tourist destination on the moon,
there are many shops and observation lounges.

name: Flamier
text:
There are also many places to play.
And at the end of this ceremony,
there will be a big fireworks display—

name: Flamier
text:
The beautiful fireworks blooming above the city of Archimedes...
Ah, just imagining it makes my heart pound!

As Flamier's eyes sparkled with delight,
Andrew clapped his hands, seemingly coming up with an idea.

name: Andrew
text:
Right, my lady.
How about Orbiter joins us
for the ceremony?

name: Andrew
text:
There will also be many festival stalls.
The ceremony might be a bit boring,
but we can explore together afterward.

name: Andrew
text:
It might be good to do some rehabilitation
outside sometimes, don't you think?
—How about it, Orbiter?

name: Orbiter
text:
Eh, there's a festival?
I'm going, I'm going!
I definitely want to go too!

Orbiter put on a happy face
on his face display and cheered.

name: Flamier
text:
Hehe, if Andrew, your guardian,
says so, then I shall accept.

name: Flamier
text:
The escort will be here soon,
so I'll let them know
that Orbiter will also be attending.

name: Andrew
text:
Haha, that's good, Orbiter!
I'll tell you about the ceremony on the way.
It's a really big festival, so you'll surely be surprised.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Okay, I got it!
I'll go get ready right away!
Just a moment!

Orbiter turned on his heel
and ran towards
the Archimedes Group Headquarters.

—And, as he ran, his spacesuit clanking,
he muttered softly so no one could hear.

name: Orbiter
text:
The ceremony seems important,
and Flamier and Andrew
probably won't notice...

name: Orbiter
text:
You two, I'm very sorry, but...
Now's my only chance.

name: Orbiter
text:
Alright, today's the day...!
I'll finally get to go on an adventure!

name: Orbiter
text:
I've been working hard to prepare...
I absolutely have to escape from here—

name: Flamier
text:
Hehe, I'm glad Orbiter-san is happy too.
It's all thanks to your suggestion, Andrew.

name: Andrew
text:
Thank you, my lady.
And I'm also looking forward to this ceremony.
It's a grand festival, after all!

—Flamier and Andrew were talking
while waiting for their escort and Orbiter.
Across the main street from them...

A group of four people
were walking towards
the "Pillar of Light".

name: Exio
text:
—Oh, it's those two...
As expected, we are close to
the Archimedes Group's Headquarters.

name: Melide
text:
...Exio-sama,
is something bothering you...?

name: Exio
text:
No, it's nothing, Melide.
I was just thinking that the ceremony
was about to begin.

name: Yoshiori
text:
The 200th anniversary of the heroes' birth ceremony, was it?
Now that you mention it, I've never
really thought about it before...

name: Yoshiori
text:
People like us...
Heroes and villains,
didn't exist 200 years ago.

name: Monomasa
text:
...To be precise,
it's been 200 years since the existence of "heroes"
was first recognized in the Earth Sphere.

name: Monomasa
text:
Also, it seems to be the 100-year mark
since the Moon officially joined the Earth Sphere Alliance.

name: Exio
text:
It seems that due to the 100-year difference,
they often celebrated the same milestones.

name: Exio
text:
Although it's an annual event,
this year it seems to be particularly grand
due to the significant milestone.

name: Yoshiori
text:
I see...
No wonder all the heroes
are gathered here.

Yoshiori lightly surveyed his surroundings.
He spotted other heroes from other companies
whom he had seen in office documents.

name: Yoshiori
text:
It's not like I have anything to hide,
but when people from the hero industry gather,
I just can't seem to relax...

name: Exio
text:
...Well, we'll just have to
get used to it little by little.
Because we're going to be part of the hero industry too.

name: Monomasa
text:
There are also those who were once villains
but later became heroes...
We are just a part of that.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Well, that's true, but...
The word "hero" still
doesn't quite suit me.

name: Melide
text:
But, Yoshiori-oniichan,
you always seem to be having fun
when you're working lately.

name: Yoshiori
text:
...H-huh!?
I-I'm fine, so there's no
need for you to watch me so closely!

name: Exio
text:
It's just like you not to deny it.
It's a good thing, isn't it?
It's important to adapt to any environment.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Even you too, Exio-san...!
It's not like that!

name: Melide
text:
Hehe, just like Akashi-oniichan.
Speaking of which, I wonder if everyone from
Parallel Flight has already arrived at the venue.

name: Monomasa
text:
If Yoshiori hears that,
he'll get even more agitated, Melide.

name: Monomasa
text:
He said he had to help with the venue setup,
so he should have arrived early.
The preparations should be almost finished by now.

Following Monomasa's gaze,
the three also looked up at the "Pillar of Light".

name: Yoshiori
text:
No matter how many times I see it, that tower is huge.
It feels like they're determined to make it a landmark.

name: Exio
text:
It seems to house various facilities,
including government offices, an Ether Reactor power plant,
commercial facilities, a restaurant district, and entertainment centres.

name: Exio
text:
It also seems to function as a
stability feature for the colony's environment
and a support pillar for the ceiling.

name: Monomasa
text:
Tourist maps were distributed, but...
The area surrounding the "Pillar of Light"
also seems to be a tourist spot.

name: Monomasa
text:
For the ceremony, there are various stalls
set up as well.
Melide, is there anything you want to eat?

name: Melide
text:
...I want something sweet.
It's my cheat day today.
Exio-sama, is that alright?

name: Exio
text:
Ah, I don't mind.
Monomasa, do you have any recommendations?

name: Yoshiori
text:
Oh, in that case, I do!
Last time I came here, I found a shop
with delicious coffee!

name: Yoshiori
text:
I think Exio-san will like it too!
Melide, the pancakes were also delicious.
You can choose between berry sauce or syrup.

name: Melide
text:
You're well-informed, Yoshiori-oniichan.
Hehe, I'm looking forward to it.

name: Monomasa
text:
Seriously...
Who is it that wanted something sweet?

name: Monomasa
text:
—Hm?
That presence just now...

Monomasa's ears twitched,
and he perked them up to carefully inspect his surroundings.

He followed with his gaze a figure
disappearing into the alleyway.
Standing beside him, Exio quietly muttered.

name: Exio
text:
...They are a bit suspicious,
but I don't sense any ill intent.
For now, they're just being sneaky.

name: Exio
text:
Some punk,
or perhaps a villain...

name: Exio
text:
Either way, if it's not in flagrante delicto,
they're not our target.
We'll leave that to the police.

name: Monomasa
text:
...You're right, there are many heroes here.
Perhaps I'm just overthinking things...

name: Exio
text:
Well, it's probably correct for our position
to be overly cautious.

name: Exio
text:
...But today,
we finally got some free time.
It's not bad to relax once in a while.

—In the alleyway where Monomasa and Exio
had looked away...
There were two figures at its end.

A boy who looked like a student
and a tall young man standing beside him.
The two faced each other and began to talk.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
—Listen closely, Gaisei-kun.
Today, we're going to act covertly.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
There are many heroes here,
so if we're found, we'll be caught.
It's important, so I'll say it twice: we'll be caught.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Caught?
This planet has enough military power to suppress
an "Observer", and this unworthy one?

Gaisei, who had been listening indifferently,
smiled thinly at the boy's words.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
That's not what I mean.
Please don't look so amused...
We're villains, after all.

name: Gaisei
text:
The presence of many heroes
is not a problem for me.
Rather, it's convenient.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
...It's often inconvenient to be caught.
For both me and you, Gaisei-kun.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
And... Please stop calling me "Observer".
I've told you so many times.

name: Gaisei
text:
Ah... Right now, this colony
has a variety of techniques.
Just how much power can I engrave upon my body...!?

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
...Sigh, you're not listening.
It's like I'm preaching to deaf ears.
Well, just be patient for a little while.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
Soon, the main event of the ceremony,
the "Hero License Public Examination",
will begin.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
...Now, Gaisei-kun.
Let's get ready.
We're heading to the examination venue.

name: Gaisei
text:
Very well.
The longer I yearn, the more
enjoyable the feast will be.

name: Gaisei
text:
And the joy that was engraved
upon my body on that day—
I will never forget it.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
......
...[Player], is it?

Emerging from the alley,
the two blended into the crowd,
and looked up at the "Pillar of Light".

Chapter 1:
The Ceremony of Hope

—Archimedes Colony.
"Pillar of Light" upper floor,
Ceremony Hall.

In the wide, open space,
heroes with agencies both within and outside
the Earth Sphere were gathered in one place.

Spotlights and countless cameras
were pointed at the podium
set up in the center.

name: Justice
text:
—Why do we,
heroes, exist?

The place fell into solemn silence,
waiting for the words of the hero
standing proudly in the light.

name: Justice
text:
Threats like Kaibutsu and villains
threaten our daily peace.
They attack without regard for place or time.

name: Justice
text:
There is no end to that battle.
Even while being hurt and lost,
we heroes must continue to fight against that threat.

name: Justice
text:
To protect the "normalcy"
of everyone's ordinary daily life,
so it won't be destroyed.

His words, straightforward,
conveyed a strong conviction.

name: Justice
text:
I believe that the heroes present here,
and those fighting on other planets,
all share the same aspiration!

name: Ryekie
text:
And I hope that the new heroes
who will be born in the future
will be the same!!

name: Justice
text:
With the justice everyone believes in,
and the justice I believe in—

name: Justice
text:
From now on, this planet's...
No, let us continue to protect
the peace of this universe!!!

name: Justice
text:
That is why we heroes
will continue to exist forever,
without end!!!!

At the words of the universally known S-rank hero,
Zap the Justice,
the venue erupted in cheers.

name: Justice
text:
Celebrating the joyous milestone of 200 years,
I shall conclude my remarks right here!!!

Ryekie bowed once and turned his back.
Then, he descended from the podium
to thunderous applause.

name: Akashi
text:
...Awesome.
He's still amazing!
Zap the Justice!!

name: Akashi
text:
Are those the words of a real S-rank hero...!?
He's so composed!

name: Mokdai
text:
He's cool, isn't he...!
To be able to hear Justice's speech
from a special seat!

name: Mokdai
text:
Ah... Entering this company,
becoming a hero...
I'm so glad I did!

name: Sui
text:
Hehe, Akashi-san and Mokdai
sure are weak to this kind of thing.
But, I must admit, my heart got a little warm too.

name: Sui
text:
I feel it even when we talk at the office,
but Ryekie-san's words feel like they seep into your heart.

options.text: He's a completely different person than when he's at the office...
Yesterday, he was groaning and rolling his eyes in front of the script.
He's our company's S-rank hero, after all!

name: Crowne
text:
When you talk to Ryekie normally,
you tend to forget that he
is one of the few S-rank heroes.

name: Crowne
text:
But today's was quite
a good speech, wasn't it?
Could it be your suggestion, Huckle?

name: Huckle
text:
No... When he was trying to memorize
the script, it was terribly bad,
so I tore it up right in front of him.

name: Huckle
text:
After I advised him to give a speech from the heart,
everything changed dramatically.

name: Huckle
text:
I can't believe he's the same person
who would hold his head in front of a mountain of documents.

name: Huckle
text:
...Perhaps, it's a perfect example
of being 'transformed'.

As they admired Ryekie's S-rank hero-like behavior and words,
the announcer's voice cut through the applause.

name: Host
text: —Thank you, Zap the Justice.

name: Host
text:
We received your congratulatory words
on behalf of all the heroes.

name: Host
text:
...Next,
we will be holding the
"Hero License Special Public Examination".

name: Host
text:
For the administering of this examination,
we have received support and sponsorship
from many people—

name: Akashi
text:
Hey, Mokdai.
Is the "Hero License Examination"
the one I took when I joined the company?

name: Mokdai
text:
Yes, that's the one.
I also took it at the License Association's facility, just like you, Akashi.
I was so nervous then...

name: Huckle
text:
That's the branch of the License Management Bureau.
That place has a bit of a tense atmosphere
because of all the people taking the exam.

name: Sui
text:
There were aptitude tests for heroes,
and written exams and interviews too...
I hadn't done anything like that since I quit school.

name: Crowne
text:
Hmm, I guess everyone else gets nervous about it.
I take qualification exams all the time,
so I'm used to it.

options.text: I don't really like tests...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Crowne
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's similar to a spaceship driver's license.
The most important thing is the determination to pass.

options.text: Is the special public exam different from usual?

name: Akashi
text:
When I took it,
they asked me in the interview if I could transform stably,
and what I valued as a hero.

name: Huckle
text:
Some studying and aptitude are necessary,
but most people who become heroes
have already cleared that bar.

name: Mokdai
text:
I heard this event is for unlicensed candidates
and people from planets where the hero system
is not yet established.

name: Sui
text:
The agencies with ties to the Earth Sphere
and the License Management Bureau are cooperating
to hold a public exam, right?

name: Sui
text:
I remember a news report saying that on the 200th anniversary,
we would witness the moment of a new hero's birth.

name: Huckle
text:
Ah. It seems they will collectively conduct
the practical exam for hero candidates
who passed the written and interview stages.

name: Huckle
text:
This exam seems to be quite special.
As it's a public exam, participants can
promote themselves for a full contract.

Huckle operated his terminal,
displaying the detailed document
sent to the agency.

name: Huckle
text:
It seems to be in a format where existing heroes
with licenses will act as examiners
and conduct mock battles.

name: Huckle
text:
Candidates will fight against these heroes
and robot-type pseudo-Kaibutsu,
and earn points based on the results—

name: Huckle
text:
Agencies will then approach
those with high scores for scouting.
That seems to be the flow.

name: Akashi
text:
Huh...
It's kind of like a
baseball draft system, isn't it?

name: Mokdai
text:
Normally, even if you get a license,
you have to go to agencies yourself for interviews
and sell yourself, right?

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, it seems that agencies are also
focusing on recruitment activities
to scout new heroes on this occasion.

name: Huckle
text:
Of course, as the agency manager, I also plan to
actively observe the exam and interact
with other agencies.

name: Crowne
text:
I see, that's a clever system.
Candidates can promote themselves to agencies,
and agencies can see their performance live.

name: Crowne
text:
Furthermore, heroes acting as examiners can also
promote themselves for license grade advancement,
right?

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, that is true. The activities of the examiners
will also be part of the operation of this ceremony,
so they can be registered as hero activities.

name: Akashi
text:
That's like us waking up early to help with venue setup, isn't it?
You said that was also a hero activity, right?

options.text: It's an event that kills three birds with one stone, isn't it?
Hero activities can vary...
Could it be that we're getting new members too!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hahaha, if there's someone who meets the conditions, we're considering that as well.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Unlike large agencies, our company doesn't yet have the system to accept many people.
However, I do want to build a foundation for that.

name: Akashi
text:
Oh, right, [Player],
didn't you also register as an Operator
to help with the operation, as an examiner?

name: Akashi
text:
Is it okay...?
You look like you aren't preparing for the exam.

options.text: Hmm, that's correct, but...
The recruitment at the time was overfilled, so...
I became a reserve.

name: Huckle
text:
It seems that several other agencies
also decided to provide on-site operators.

name: Huckle
text:
The others will handle things remotely
as usual from their respective agencies, and it became
a request to respond if there were any vacancies.

name: Huckle
text:
Since no emergency contacts were issued
before the exam started,
it seems there were no issues.

name: Akashi
text:
Then you don't have any work
during the ceremony, do you?
In that case, let's go around the stalls together later!

As the group was talking,
Ryekie, who had been on the stage earlier,
returned after transforming back.

name: Ryekie
text:
Haha, I'm back!
I successfully finished my speech!
It's been a while since I've had a speaking engagement!!!

name: Ryekie
text:
[Player], thank you for observing me!!!!
As expected, in stage, I must be in that form!!!

options.text: It's an Operator's job!
Your speech was cool!

name: Crowne
text:
That was really well done, wasn't it?
It was a good speech.

name: Sui
text:
Yes, Ryekie-san's appearance on stage was cool.
And Mokdai and Akashi-san too—

name: Akashi
text:
H-Hey, Sui!
Don't say anything more...!
Don't say that directly in front of him...!

name: Sui
text:
It means no harm, so you don't have
to worry so much, do you?

name: Mokdai
text:
...No, Sui.
Everyone has their own way of 'supporting'.
I understand, because it's 'just how it is'.

name: Sui
text:
I-Is that how it is...?
Well, if that's the case, then it's fine.

name: Ryekie
text:
Oh, what's wrong!?
We're talking about my speech, right!?

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, but let's save that for when we return to the office.
...Look, the event seems to be starting.

Stopping their conversation, the group
looked in the direction Huckle was pointing.

The host bowed,
and while operating a terminal,
began to speak.

name: Host
text:
—Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for waiting.
We will now begin the
"Hero License Special Public Examination".

name: Host
text:
First, we will guide everyone to the
examination venue's observation seats.

name: Host
text:
Those currently participating, please remain
standby here in the ceremony hall.

name: Ryekie
text:
Oh, it seems to be starting!
Where should I go now—
Woah, what happened!?

Small sounds of surprise rose from the venue,
including from Ryekie.

The focus of their attention was the floor.
The floor began to glow with a faint blue light.

options.text: W-What is this...?
Why is the floor glowing?

name: Crowne
text:
...Oh, this is the rumored thing.
It's quite an elaborate mechanism.

name: Sui
text:
It's a beautiful light.
Crowne-san, do you know something about this?

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, in this Archimedes Colony,
warp technology is incorporated for human movement,
which you wouldn't see much in the Earth Sphere.

name: Crowne
text:
It's currently in the initial stage of implementation,
and it seems to be monitoring the entire space
of specific target areas.

name: Crowne
text:
It was a topic of discussion that it would be expanded
to the entire colony in the future, so I was curious.
I didn't realize it had already reached a practical level.

options.text: Warp technology...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sui
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In familiar terms, this is also used to transfer our hero suits, right?
Is this a larger version of that?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Crowne
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's the micro-warp gate function of the terminal.
The theory and method used are different from that, but broadly speaking, it is the same 'warp'.

options.text: It's used for interstellar travel, too, right?
Eh, is that really possible?

name: Crowne
text:
What is it, [Player]?
Are you interested in warp technology?

name: Mokdai
text:
You often use warps when traveling long distances by spaceship, right?
You know, the one where you enter from the big gate in lunar orbit.

name: Mokdai
text:
When you're riding a space taxi, or something,
[Player], you must have seen it before, right?

name: Crowne
text:
That's a large-scale system that coordinates the vanishing
drive installed in the spaceship with the gate's
subspace transfer and superluminal communication functions.

name: Akashi
text:
So, this is a small-scale version
that can be used for human-sized travel?
Sounds convenient for going to a convenience store!

name: Crowne
text:
Hahaha, that's right.
If we could fix the transfer destination coordinates
here, then such applications might become possible.

name: Crowne
text:
However, with the current technological
capabilities of the Earth Sphere, I doubt human-sized
warp travels will be implemented anytime soon.

Crowne looked curiously at the blue light
slowly rising from around them.

name: Huckle
text:
The warp technology used by spaceships in the Earth Sphere
requires the installation of huge equipment, immense energy
consumption, and consequently, extremely high costs.

name: Huckle
text:
If one were to attempt to realize it on an individual human scale,
technical cooperation from other planets would be essential,
and the operational costs would be tremendous.

name: Crowne
text:
And yet, they've brought it to a practical level,
though it's limited to intra-city movement.
That's an incredible feat, isn't it?

name: Crowne
text:
Oh, look, [Player].
It seems they're about to explain things.

name: Host
text:
—Ladies and gentlemen, when you entered the "Pillar of Light",
may I believe that all of you have updated your terminals?

name: Host
text:
By utilizing this function,
you'll be able to warp travel within the examination
area and the ceremony hall.

options.text: Come to think of it, I did show my terminal.
You can use warp just with that, huh...

name: Host
text:
At both the entrance and exit of warp travel,
a 'superimposed state' of existing and
non-existing states is maintained.

name: Host
text:
This allows for instantaneous movement,
no matter how far apart the locations are,
once the existence at the exit side is confirmed.

name: Host
text:
Furthermore, if 'self-recognition' at the exit side—
That is, self-existence approval fails,
the transfer will not be executed.

name: Host
text:
Therefore, even in the unlikely event of a malfunction or accident,
there will be no danger, so please rest assured.

name: Host
text:
If you wish to move to the observation seats,
please press the "Participate" button
on your terminal.

options.text: I don't understand a single bit...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Crowne
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hahaha, well, it delves a bit into technical details.

options.text: I see, that's the theory.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Crowne
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, you understand this explanation?
You're quite good.

options.text: Crowne-san, could you explain it again!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Crowne
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hahaha, well, it delves a bit into technical details.

name: Crowne
text:
Within the area monitored by the warp system,
warp is realized by the observation
of one's own existence 'there'.

name: Crowne
text:
Also, if self-recognition at the destination fails...
Meaning if there's an obstacle, for example,
the warp won't occur.

name: Ryekie
text:
So, accidents like transferring inside
a wall won't happen, right!?
Then I can rest assured!!

name: Akashi
text:
Oh, really...?
Well, you can use it even if you don't know how it works.
Like with terminals, for example.

name: Crowne
text:
That's right.
Warp technology has been confirmed safe
and is widely used—

name: Crowne
text:
Even so, when it comes to one's own body,
some people still feel uneasy.

name: Crowne
text:
In fact, if you're already in a spaceship,
warp is often used.
It's no different from that.

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, and it also boasts as
a perfect security system,
unless Kaibutsu appear, that is.

name: Crowne
text:
Hahaha, they sure talk big
at a hero gathering.
That's reassuring.

name: Crowne
text:
Well, this is kind of a debut party,
so they're probably being thorough about it.

Crowne laughed and
tapped the "Participate" button.

[Player] and the others
followed Crowne's example and likewise,
tapped "Participate" on their own terminals.

name: Host
text:
Now, we will begin the transfer
to the examination venue observation seats.

Along with the host's words,
a blue light enveloped the surroundings,
and when the light subsided—

[Player] and the others
had moved to another venue,
like a hotel lounge.

options.text: Oh, this is what they called "warping"...!
Did we teleport!?

name: Mokdai
text:
Wow, that's amazing...!
It's a bit different from the warp I usually feel on spaceships,
and it's refreshing!

name: Sui
text:
Indeed, it would be convenient
if you could move around the city like this.
...Though I might get out of shape.

name: Ryekie
text:
It seems faster than my full-power speed!
As expected of warp technology!!

name: Crowne
text:
Hahaha, how was it, [Player]?
Did you like it?

options.text: I was a little uneasy, but...
Amazing, it's so interesting that it can do this!

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm, this seems to be the venue
right next to the examination area.

name: Huckle
text:
It seems that for this examination,
they built a model city
and are using it as the examination area.

Huckle muttered as he checked
the detailed information of the public exam
on his terminal.

name: Crowne
text:
Haah... As expected, they're spending a lot of money.
It's a method only possible because Archimedes and
the License Association have joined forces.

name: Akashi
text:
By the way, it's a practical exam, right?
They'll be using Parallel Weapons, so
isn't it dangerous to be nearby?

name: Akashi
text:
When I took the Parallel Weapon exam,
they took me to a wide-open area
with nothing else around.

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, there was an
explanation for that too.

name: Huckle
text:
It seems that the License Association has deployed
a barrier to prevent stray Parallel Weapon shots.

name: Huckle
text:
The observation seats and the examination area
are separated by that barrier.

name: Ryekie
text:
I see!
We can cheer for the examinees'
performance on this monitor, right!?

Multiple giant holographic images were displayed
in the direction Ryekie pointed, and
members of other agencies were also gathered there.

The holographic images showed the examinees,
who looked nervous.

name: Sui
text:
Hehe, it's kind of nostalgic.
I wonder if I was like that too.

name: Mokdai
text:
It makes you want to cheer for them, doesn't it?
Hehe, future heroes...!
I'm going to have so many more 'favorites'!

name: Akashi
text:
Hehe, I feel like I'm getting junior colleagues!
[Player], let's sit together and watch.

To support those aspiring to be new heroes,
they freely took their seats.

options.text: Oh, I'll go get some drinks.
Akashi, can you save me a seat?

text:
[Player] spoke to Akashi and the others,
then looked around the venue
for the drink counter.

name: Akashi
text:
In that case, may I come along?
You won't be able to carry it all by yourself, right?

options.text: I'll borrow a tray, so it's fine.
Everyone worked hard setting up, so rest!
I want to do something myself too.

name: Akashi
text:
Is that so?
Alright, I'll leave it to you.
Um... Thank you!

name: Akashi
text:
You probably don't know your way around
after just warping here,
so call me if you get lost, okay?

Waving lightly to Akashi in response,
[Player] began to walk, searching
for the drink counter in the venue.

options.text: Um, drinks, drinks...
I'll get some snacks too while I'm at it.
Is it this way...?

text:
And after walking around for a few minutes,
they reached the corner of a hallway.

options.text: What's this sound...?

text:
An unfamiliar short alert sound
was continuously being emitted
from [Player]'s terminal.

options.text: My terminal... broke?
Is this supposed to be alright...?

text:
[Player] checked the terminal.
However, in the meantime, the interval of the sound
gradually shortened.

Then, a 'blue light'
emerged around [Player].
The light enveloped their body—

options.text: T-This looks bad...!
W-Wait, could this be...!

text:
—When the light subsided,
[Player]'s figure was
no longer there.

name: Sui
text:
...Huh, Akashi-san.
Where's [Player]-san?

name: Akashi
text:
Oh, they said they'd bring drinks.
Let's sit and wait first.
They also wanted to do something.

name: Sui
text:
[Player]-san is kind, aren't they?
They even offered to help
during the setup.

name: Mokdai
text:
Hehe, that's just like [Player].
Well then, let's take them up on their offer.

name: Mokdai
text:
...Ah, Akashi, Sui!
It's about to start!
Come on, sit, sit!

name: Mokdai
text:
I'll have to record it properly,
so, when [Player] comes back,
they can see it from the beginning!

name: Host
text:
—Thank you for waiting.
Now, we will begin the
"Hero License Special Public Examination".
